mapper.select:
/*requestEvaluationMemberTot*/
SELECT IF(T1_SEQ_TEMP = T2_SEQ_TEMP, '', T1_TEMP) AS T1, T2_TEMP AS T2, IF(T1_SEQ_TEMP = T2_SEQ_TEMP, '', T1_SEQ_TEMP) AS T1_SEQ, T2_SEQ_TEMP AS T2_SEQ, ZZ.* FROM ( SELECT IF(DUTY_NAME = '' OR DUTY_NAME IS NULL, POSITION_NAME, DUTY_NAME) AS DUTY_POSITION_NAME, IFNULL(IF(T1_EVAL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND T1_EVAL_NAME != '', T1_EVAL_NAME, IF(T1_A = '' OR T1_A IS NULL, T1_B, T1_A)), '') AS T1_TEMP, IFNULL(IF(T2_EVAL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND T2_EVAL_NAME != '', T2_EVAL_NAME, IF(T2_A = '' OR T2_A IS NULL, T2_B, T2_A)), '') AS T2_TEMP,
IFNULL(IF(T1_EVAL_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND T1_EVAL_SEQ != '', T1_EVAL_SEQ, IF(T1_A_SEQ = '' OR T1_A_SEQ IS NULL, T1_B_SEQ, T1_A_SEQ)), '') AS T1_SEQ_TEMP, IFNULL(IF(T2_EVAL_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND T2_EVAL_SEQ != '', T2_EVAL_SEQ, IF(T2_A_SEQ = '' OR T2_A_SEQ IS NULL, T2_B_SEQ, T2_A_SEQ)), '') AS T2_SEQ_TEMP,
CASE WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'P&M' THEN CONCAT('경영관리(', OCCUPATION_NM, ')') WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'A&C' THEN CONCAT('기업지원(', OCCUPATION_NM, ')') WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'R&D' THEN CONCAT('연구개발(', OCCUPATION_NM, ')') ELSE '' END AS OCC_NM, Z.* FROM (SELECT IF(A.DUTY_CODE IN ('2', '3', '7'), '노상흡 원장', '') AS T1_A, IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', IFNULL((SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' 팀장') FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ AND DUTY_CODE IN ('4', '5')) , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' 실장') FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE = '7')) , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' ', DUTY_NAME) FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2','3','7'))) AS T1_B, IF(A.DUTY_CODE IN ('2', '3', '7'), '32', '') AS T1_A_SEQ, IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', IFNULL((SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ AND DUTY_CODE IN ('4', '5') LIMIT 1) , (SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE = '7')) , (SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2','3','7'))) AS T1_B_SEQ,
IF(A.DUTY_CODE IN ('4', '5'), '노상흡 원장', '') AS T2_A, IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' ', DUTY_NAME) FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2', '3', '7')), '') AS T2_B, IF(A.DUTY_CODE IN ('4', '5'), '32', '') AS T2_A_SEQ, IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', (SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2','3','7')), '') AS T2_B_SEQ, A.DUTY_NAME AS T2_NAME,
(SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = IF((SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) = 1000, A.DEPT_SEQ, (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ))) AS DEPT_NAME_OD, (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 9 AND CM_CODE = A.OCCUPATION_CODE) AS OCCUPATION_NM, IF((SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) = 1000, '', B.DEPT_NAME) AS TEAM_NAME, (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ= A.DEPT_SEQ) AS PARENT_DEPT_SEQ,
A.*, SUBSTRING_INDEX(TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, A.JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) / 12, 1), '.', 1) AS hire, CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, A.JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) / 12, 1), '.', -1) + 1) AS hire_mon, (SELECT EVAL_EVAL_F_NAME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_EMP_SEQ = A.EMP_SEQ AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} ORDER BY EVAL_MEM_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS T1_EVAL_NAME, (SELECT EVAL_EVAL_S_NAME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_EMP_SEQ = A.EMP_SEQ AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} ORDER BY EVAL_MEM_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS T2_EVAL_NAME, (SELECT EVAL_EVAL_F_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_EMP_SEQ = A.EMP_SEQ AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} ORDER BY EVAL_MEM_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS T1_EVAL_SEQ, (SELECT EVAL_EVAL_S_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_EMP_SEQ = A.EMP_SEQ AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} ORDER BY EVAL_MEM_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS T2_EVAL_SEQ, (SELECT RMK FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_EMP_SEQ = A.EMP_SEQ AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} ORDER BY EVAL_MEM_SN DESC LIMIT 1) AS RMK FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_SEQ = B.DEPT_SEQ WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(#{bsYMD}, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(A.JOIN_DAY, '%Y%m%d') AND OCCUPATION_CODE IN (1,2,3)) Z) ZZ ORDER BY (CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(ZZ.DEPT_NAME_OD,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(ZZ.DEPT_NAME_OD,1)) < 128 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), ZZ.DEPT_NAME_OD, TEAM_NAME, FIELD(DUTY_CODE, 1, 2, 3, 7, 4, 5, ''), EMP_NAME_KR
SELECT A.EVAL_EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM A WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
SELECT COUNT(A.EVAL_EMP_SEQ) as cnt FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM A WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}

SELECT A.*, B.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE eval_sn = A.EVAL_SN) AS EVAL_MEM FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.dj_evaluation_cap B ON A.EVAL_SN = B.EVAL_SN WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y'
AND A.BS_YEAR = #{year}
SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND EVAL_STAT != 'W' ORDER BY EVAL_SN DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT EVAL_PER_CONTENT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS evalChk FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND BS_YEAR = #{bsYear} AND EVAL_NUM = #{evalNum}
AND EVAL_SN NOT IN (#{evalSn})
SELECT A.*, B.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_CAP B ON A.EVAL_SN = B.EVAL_SN WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS self FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_CAP B ON A.EVAL_SN = B.EVAL_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.dj_evaluation_mem C ON A.EVAL_SN = C.EVAL_SN AND C.EVAL_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND C.EVAL_EMP_SEQ IS NOT NULL
/*getEvaluation*/ SELECT A.*, B.* FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION A LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_CAP B ON A.EVAL_SN = B.EVAL_SN WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
/*getEvaluationBs*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'business'
/*getEvaluationBs*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'support'
/*getEvaluationBsList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'business'
/*getEvaluationBsList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'support'
/*getEvaluationScList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_GRADE WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insEvaluation*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION ( BS_YEAR, EVAL_NUM, EVAL_STAT, EVAL_CONTENT, EVAL_PER_CONTENT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{bsYear}, #{evalNum}, #{evalStat}, #{content}, #{perContent}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_EVALUATION'
mapper.update: /*updEvaluation*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION SET BS_YEAR = #{bsYear}, EVAL_NUM = #{evalNum}, EVAL_STAT = #{evalStat}, EVAL_COM_PER = #{evalComPer}, EVAL_ACH_PER = #{evalAhcPer}, EVAL_CONTENT = #{content}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insReqEvaluation*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION ( BS_YEAR, EVAL_NUM, EVAL_STAT, EVAL_COM_PER, EVAL_ACH_PER, MOD_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{bsYear}, #{evalNum}, #{evalStat}, #{evalComPer}, #{evalAhcPer}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_EVALUATION'
mapper.update: /*updReqEvaluation*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION SET BS_YEAR = #{bsYear}, EVAL_NUM = #{evalNum}, EVAL_STAT = #{evalStat}, EVAL_COM_PER = #{evalComPer}, EVAL_ACH_PER = #{evalAhcPer}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
/*delEvaluation*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION SET ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
mapper.insert: /*insEvaluationAppBt*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, TEAM_SUM, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM_RESULT, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT_RESULT, TEAM_LEADER_SUM, DEPT_HD_DEPT, DEPT_HD_DEPT_RESULT, DEPT_HD_COR, DEPT_HD_COR_RESULT, DEPT_HD_SUM, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, 'business', #{btSum}, #{btResult1}, #{btResult2}, #{bdResult1}, #{bdResult2}, #{bdSum}, #{bhResult1}, #{bhResult2}, #{bcResult1}, #{bcResult2}, #{bhSum}, NOW(), #{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /*updEvaluationAppBt*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP SET TEAM_SUM = #{btSum}, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM = #{btResult1}, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM_RESULT = #{btResult2}, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT = #{bdResult1}, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT_RESULT = #{bdResult2}, TEAM_LEADER_SUM = #{bdSum}, DEPT_HD_DEPT = #{bhResult1}, DEPT_HD_DEPT_RESULT = #{bhResult2}, DEPT_HD_COR = #{bcResult1}, DEPT_HD_COR_RESULT = #{bcResult2}, DEPT_HD_SUM = #{bhSum}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'business'
mapper.insert: /*insEvaluationAppBs*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, TEAM_SUM, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM_RESULT, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT_RESULT, TEAM_LEADER_SUM, DEPT_HD_DEPT, DEPT_HD_DEPT_RESULT, DEPT_HD_COR, DEPT_HD_COR_RESULT, DEPT_HD_SUM, REG_DT, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, 'support', #{bsSum}, #{stResult1}, #{stResult2}, #{sdResult1}, #{sdResult2}, #{sdSum}, #{shResult1}, #{shResult2}, #{scResult1}, #{scResult2}, #{scSum}, NOW(), #{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /*updEvaluationAppBs*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP SET TEAM_SUM = #{bsSum}, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM = #{stResult1}, TEAM_LEADER_TEAM_RESULT = #{stResult2}, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT = #{sdResult1}, TEAM_LEADER_DEPT_RESULT = #{sdResult2}, TEAM_LEADER_SUM = #{sdSum}, DEPT_HD_DEPT = #{shResult1}, DEPT_HD_DEPT_RESULT = #{shResult2}, DEPT_HD_COR = #{scResult1}, DEPT_HD_COR_RESULT = #{scResult2}, DEPT_HD_SUM = #{scSum}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'support'
mapper.insert: /*insEvaluationEmp*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_EMP_SEQ, EVAL_EVAL_F_SEQ, EVAL_EVAL_F_NAME, EVAL_EVAL_S_SEQ, EVAL_EVAL_S_NAME, RMK ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{empSeq}, #{t1seq}, #{t1Name}, #{t2seq}, #{t2Name}, #{rmk} )

/*insEvaluationCap*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_CAP ( EVAL_SN, CAP_IDX, COND_STR_DT, COND_END_DT, EVAL_STR_DT, EVAL_END_DT, TEAM_MEMBER_A, TEAM_MEMBER_B, TEAM_MEMBER_C, TEAM_MANAGER_A, TEAM_MANAGER_B, TEAM_MANAGER_C, DEPT_MANAGER_A, DEPT_MANAGER_B, DEPT_MANAGER_C ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{idx}, #{condStrDt}, #{condEndDt}, #{evalStrDt}, #{evalEndDt}, #{teamMemberA}, #{teamMemberB}, #{teamMemberC}, #{teamManagerA}, #{teamManagerB}, #{teamManagerC}, #{deptManagerA}, #{deptManagerB}, #{deptManagerC} )
mapper.delete: /*delEvaluationBt*/ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'business'
mapper.insert: /*insEvaluationBt*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, EVAL_FIELD, EVAL_W, EVAL_R ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{evalType}, #{btField}, #{btValue}, #{btScore} )
mapper.delete: /*delEvaluationBs*/ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = 'support'
mapper.insert: /*insEvaluationBs*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_APP_TEAM ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, EVAL_FIELD, EVAL_W, EVAL_R ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{evalType}, #{bsField}, #{bsValue}, #{bsScore} )

/*insEvaluationScore*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_GRADE ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_GRADE, EVAL_LEVEL, EVAL_RATE, EVAL_SCORE_A, EVAL_SCORE_B ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{scClass}, #{scLevel}, #{scPerson}, #{scScore1}, #{scScore2} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_CAP WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn}
mapper.delete: /*delEvaluationMngList*/ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND EVAL_TYPE = #{eType} AND EVAL_POSITION_TYPE = #{pType}
mapper.insert: /*setEvaluationMngList*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, EVAL_POSITION_TYPE, EVAL_CAP, EVAL_TITLE, EVAL_VAL, EVAL_STR_S, EVAL_END_S, EVAL_STR_A, EVAL_END_A, EVAL_STR_B, EVAL_END_B, EVAL_STR_C, EVAL_END_C, EVAL_STR_D, EVAL_END_D, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{eType}, #{pType}, #{evalCap}, #{evalTitle}, #{evalVal}, #{gradeS_s}, #{gradeS_e}, #{gradeA_s}, #{gradeA_e}, #{gradeB_s}, #{gradeB_e}, #{gradeC_s}, #{gradeC_e}, #{gradeD_s}, #{gradeD_e}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.select: /*getEvalMemDet*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_MEM_SN = #{evalMemSn}

/*getUserPersonnelinformOne*/
SELECT IF(DUTY_NAME = '' || DUTY_NAME IS NULL, POSITION_NAME, DUTY_NAME) AS DUTY_POSITION_NAME, IF(T1_A = '' || T1_A IS NULL, T1_B, T1_A) AS T1, IF(T2_A = '' || T2_A IS NULL, T2_B, T2_A) AS T2, CASE WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'P&M' THEN CONCAT('경영관리(', OCCUPATION_NM,')') WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'A&C' THEN CONCAT('기업지원(', OCCUPATION_NM,')') WHEN OCCUPATION_NM = 'R&D' THEN CONCAT('연구개발(', OCCUPATION_NM,')') ELSE '' END AS OCC_NM, Z.* FROM (SELECT IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '2', '노상흡 원장', '') AS T1_A , IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', IFNULL( (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' 팀장') FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ AND DUTY_CODE IN ('4', '5')) , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' 실장') FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE = '7')) , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' ', DUTY_NAME) FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2','3','7'))) AS T1_B , IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '5', '노상흡 원장', '') AS T2_A , IF(A.DUTY_CODE = '', (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_NAME_KR, ' ', DUTY_NAME) FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) AND DUTY_CODE IN ('2','3','7')), '') AS T2_B , A.DUTY_NAME AS T2_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = IF((SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) = 1000, A.DEPT_SEQ, (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ))) AS DEPT_NAME_OD , (SELECT CM_CODE_NM FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 9 AND CM_CODE = A.OCCUPATION_CODE) AS OCCUPATION_NM , IF((SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) = 1000, '', B.DEPT_NAME) AS TEAM_NAME ,(SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ= A.DEPT_SEQ) AS PARENT_DEPT_SEQ ,A.* ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, A.JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) / 12, 1), '.', 1) AS hire ,CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(TRUNCATE(TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, A.JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) / 12, 1), '.', -1) + 1) AS hire_mon FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_SEQ = B.DEPT_SEQ WHERE A.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(#{bsYMD}, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(A.JOIN_DAY, '%Y%m%d') AND OCCUPATION_CODE IN (1,2,3) AND EMP_SEQ=#{empSeq}) Z ORDER BY (CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(Z.DEPT_NAME_OD,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(Z.DEPT_NAME_OD,1)) < 128 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), Z.DEPT_NAME_OD, TEAM_NAME, FIELD(DUTY_CODE, 1, 2, 3, 7, 4, 5, ''), EMP_NAME_KR
mapper.delete: /*delEvalScoreTemSave*/ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM_RESULT WHERE EVAL_ITEM_ID = #{evalItemId} AND EVAL_TYPE = #{evalType} AND TEM_ACTIVE = 'N' AND EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert: /*setEvalScoreTemSave*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM_RESULT ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_ITEM_ID, EVAL_EMP_SEQ, EMP_SEQ, EVAL_SCORE, EVAL_TYPE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{evalSn}, #{evalItemId}, #{evalEmpSeq}, #{empSeq}, #{evalScore}, #{evalType}, #{evalEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /*updEvalScoreTemSave*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM_RESULT SET TEM_ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE EVAL_ITEM_ID = #{evalItemId} AND EVAL_TYPE = #{evalType} AND EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert: /*setEvaluationItemCopy*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM ( EVAL_SN, EVAL_TYPE, EVAL_POSITION_TYPE, EVAL_CAP, EVAL_TITLE, EVAL_VAL, EVAL_STR_S, EVAL_STR_A, EVAL_STR_B, EVAL_END_B, EVAL_STR_C, EVAL_STR_D, REG_EMP_SEQ ) SELECT #{evalSn}, EVAL_TYPE, EVAL_POSITION_TYPE, EVAL_CAP, EVAL_TITLE, EVAL_VAL, EVAL_STR_S, EVAL_STR_A, EVAL_STR_B, EVAL_END_B, EVAL_STR_C, EVAL_STR_D, #{empSeq} FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_ITEM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{copyEvalSn}
mapper.select: /*getNowEvalCount*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EVALUATION_MEM WHERE EVAL_SN = #{evalSn} AND (EVAL_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} OR EVAL_EVAL_F_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} OR EVAL_EVAL_S_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq})
